import React, {useState} from "react"; import styles from "./header.module.css"; function Header(){ const [isDarkMode, setIsDarkMode] = useState(true); const [selectedLanguage, setSelectedLanguage] = useState('UA'); // Стан для вибраної мови const toggleTheme = () => { setIsDarkMode((prevMode) => !prevMode); }; const handleLanguageChange = (event) => { setSelectedLanguage(event.target.value); // Оновлюємо вибрану мову }; return (
